Package ca.cs.ualberta.localpost.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommentListAdapter
    Custom ListView adapter that allows us to change the layout of each listview element according our own specifications.
    EditComment
    This Activity allows users to edit a previously posted comments
    FavoritesView
    View that Displays all of the users favorited comments
    FreshestTabView
    This View will show all the comments that are in the area around the user.
    GreatestTabView
    Displays comments in descending order according to the amount of points accumulated.
    LastestTabView
    Displays the comments from most recent post date
    MainActivity
    Main code was provided from Android Hive.
    SubmitComment
    This activity allows the user to enter and submit a new comment
    TabsPagerAdapter
    Adapter for Fragments(Tab Views) Code Skeleton was provided by Android Hive.
    ThreadView
    NOT DONE OR IMPLEMENTED Displays a comment and all the replies associated with the comment
    UserProfile
    This view will display a users information The user will be able to change their user name, view their comment history and view their favourited comments
